activities: AE may process personal information of employees, consultants and job applicants for business planning, compliance with corporate policies, and administration of human resources and employee benefit programs. More specifically, AE holds and processes personal information to pay and review compensation; provide and administer benefits; managing user accounts in various IT systems; to administer contracts and other business relationships; administer and maintain personnel records; carry out performance reviews; make assignment and promotion decisions; conduct disciplinary or grievance procedures; and facilitate compliance with AE’s policies, industry standards, and legal requirements.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Cooperation with the EU DPAs and Swiss FDPIC
